Actions.Name: Devour
Actions.Description: The Ghul become immobile and gains
Actions.Delay:
It must take a slow turn next round, but at the start of that turn, it emits an aura 2 effect around it, which only affects non-relict characters. It has different effects depending on the number of non-relict, non-summon characters in the aura. Damage dealt is divine.
1 character: 100% HP
2 characters: 25% HP
3+ characters: 1 HP.
